alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 29 at 4:22PM EDT until June 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 415 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ILLINOIS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL ILLINOIS DE KALB LA SALLE LEE OGLE IN NORTHEAST ILLINOIS COOK DUPAGE GRUNDY KANE KENDALL WILL IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST INDIANA LAKE IN PORTER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AURORA, BOLINGBROOK, BYRON, CAROL STREAM, CHESTERTON, CHICAGO, COAL CITY, DEKALB, DIXON, DOWNERS GROVE, ELGIN, EVANSTON, GARY, HAMMOND, JOLIET, LA SALLE, LEMONT, LOMBARD, MARSEILLES, MENDOTA, MERRILLVILLE, MINOOKA, MORRIS, NAPERVILLE, OAK LAWN, OREGON, ORLAND PARK, OSWEGO, OTTAWA, PARK FOREST, PLANO, PORTAGE, ROCHELLE, SCHAUMBURG, STREATOR, SYCAMORE, VALPARAISO, WHEATON, WILMINGTON, AND YORKVILLE.
